title: Marlin Waters
brief_description: Deep sea fishing off the coast of New Zealand. Photographed largely around the Bay of Islands, which has become a centre for the sport and attracts big game fishermen from the United States, who pass on their skill to newcomers. Shows several long fights with the big fish.
